title.narrative: Estudio comparado sobre aspectos seleccionados de las políticas de introducción de las tecnologías de la información y comunicación en la educación con el objetivo de ofrecer insumos para la consolidación y desarrollo continuo de la Política Pública de TIC

description.narrative: The proposed activity aims at providing technical assistance to the Government of the City of Buenos Aires. The project includes the development of a comparative study on the teaching of programming from primary school until the completion of secondary school. It also foresees analyzing existing policies for introducing information and communication technologies in education with the aim of giving input to the consolidation and continuous development of the Public Policy of ICT for Education in the City of Buenos Aires, in line with the main international standards, particularly those approved by UNESCO and having the Sustainable Development Goals as a horizon, particularly the SDG4.
